about_the_game:
Explore the music of Lords of the Fallen while listening to the Official Soundtrack. Beautifully composed and produced by the renowned Knut Avenstroup Haugen, performed by the Bratislava Symphony Orchestra and Choir, and conducted by David Hernando Rico, this album will take you back to Harkyn’s endeavors in finding the source of all evil.

Track list:
01 Prologue: The Light
02 Harkyn’s Journey
03 Cursed and Abandoned
04 God’s Palm
05 Penance
06 Into the Heart of the Earth
07 The Lords
08 The Citadel
09 Mortification
10 Chamber of Lies
11 Sacrifice
12 Temple of Torture
13 Atonement
14 Winter’s Kiss (Theme from Lords of the Fallen co-written with Emília Rovira Alegre)
15 Epilogue: The Darkness
